reviewText: Down to earth story based on fact as well as fiction about a young man in an Indiana reform school. Classic actors and coming of age events well performed.

Phenomenal movie about a boy from the city who starts to go bad and is sent to a country farm type reformatory.  He is friended by William Bendix who runs the barn. He learns to care for and love a mare who is in foal.  When the foal is born, the mare dies and while for a time, he becomes angry, he learns to love the foal whose life was given to him by its mother that died.
